ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lock picking the Hole
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm... I thought I saw a patch message a while back about the locks in Befallen being changed so you couldn t pick them anymore? -=B=- On Strike ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm... I thought I saw a patch message a while back about the locks in
Befallen being changed so you couldn't pick them anymore?


-=B=-
On Strike
----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 14, 2000 11:50 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lock picking the Hole


>
> For me at least - the initial training point got my skill high enough to
> pick The Hole lock every try. I would recommend keeping an extra pick or
> two in the bank in case you die - a very likely possibility in The Hole.
>
>
> Slyde
> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Thursday, September 14, 2000 11:12 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lockpicking the Hole
>
> I think they covered it - all but you may need to go to bard guild and
train
> the initial point to start the skill - can't remember if you need to or
not.
> Pick locks sounded so cool - little did I know where those locks would be
> and such.
>
> Sylly
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
